title: Interpretation of a dream about water and fish by Ibn Sirin and leading scholars

preview.html: What are the strongest interpretations of a dream about water and fish? Water and fish are two strong symbols in dreams, and as we promised you on the Egyptian website, we put in your hands the strongest interpretations of dreams, dream about them, follow them below. Interpretation of a dream about water and fish If the dreamer sees that he was in the sea or river and saw a lot of fish, then according to the size and shape of the fish, the dream will be interpreted and the general meaning of seeing fish is abundant money, which will be followed by great psychological and physical comfort for the dreamer. When the dreamer sees many large, small and colorful fish, this diversity in the sizes and shapes of fish indicates the multiplicity and abundance of livelihoods, and the dreamer can work in many jobs and succeed and get abundant money from them. If the fortuneteller sees that the fish has wings and flies above the surface of the water and then dives again, he will not be restricted in his life for a long time, but will find freedom and happiness, and if the fortuneteller suffers from the dictatorship of those around him, he will be independent of them and have his own life. The previous dream of the prisoner is a sign of innocence or appreciation of the prison period and soon to get out, and whoever was restricted due to poverty and lack of strength, the restrictions will be broken Poverty and will live free and independent and a lot of money. If the dreamer sees a goldfish in the water, this symbol will see him lucky who will experience many successful adventures in his life and will also have great wealth that will make him live in contentment and prosperity. The goldfish indicates that God has blessed the dreamer with insight and intuition, and this blessing makes him avoid dealing with fraudsters and liars, as he refrains from engaging in fruitless projects, and there is no doubt that it is a blessing. It is given only to people who are loved by God Almighty. If the dreamer goes down to the sea or river in his dream and is surprised by a fish talking to him fluently as a man speaks, he will also get what God has parted with him in a short time. If he was looking for a secret or a truth and what he saw in this dream, God will put in his hands all the truths he had searched for before, and the mystery in which he lived and made him fear him will soon disappear. If the dreamer sees a fish in the water with legs like a man, the scene shows three indicators, which are as follows: Or not: Some people get a living in the long term, and others earn it quickly, and if the dreamer sees this vision, the living will come to him as soon as possible. Second: This dream reveals the dreamer's boredom and his desire to change his lifestyle and will present many innovations in his professional, family and social life so that he feels positive energy inside him. Third: Some jurists said that the dream indicates the proliferation of the dreamer's friends and his exit from the well of isolation and introversion in which he lived, knowing that his new friends will be an occasion to increase his livelihood. Interpretation of the dream of water and fish by Ibn Sirin When a bachelor goes to the sea in his dream and sees a fish, he marries one woman, and if he sees two fish, he marries two women, but if he sees a lot of countless fish, his money will be abundant. The future. If the dreamer sees that he has descended

title: Interpretation of seeing amulets in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing Ibn Sirin’s talismans. Interpretation of seeing talismans in a dream is one of the unpleasant visions that portend evil and evil. As for seeing decoding talismans in a dream, it indicates a person who is wise and logical in making decisions. Seeing someone in a dream writing amulets in a dream indicates many mistakes that He commits it. As for the person who sees in a dream that he is pronouncing amulets, this indicates praiseworthy events that will occur in reality. If the dreamer sees a magician in a dream deciphering amulets, then this vision indicates travel in the near future. Interpretation of a dream about amulets for single womenIf a girl sees An unmarried woman herself gives someone a spell written on money, this indicates that she will receive a great livelihood and abundant money. As for the girl who sees that she abstains from magic and repents from amulets and amulets, this indicates the end of problems and worries. Deciphering the spells in the girl’s dream indicates Having a distance from sins. If a girl sees in a dream that she is under the influence of amulets and loses consciousness, this indicates a great danger that she will face. Interpretation of a dream about amulets for a married woman. Dreaming about hieroglyphs in a married woman’s dream is evidence of the anxiety and fear in which she lives. If a married woman sees amulets in a dream And incomprehensible words, this means that she is unable to bear responsibility. Seeing a paper with some hieroglyphic symbols written on it is proof of the sins and immorality that this woman has committed. But if she sees that she is decoding the amulets, then she shows interest in the children and her married life will be stable. Burning the amulets in a dream for a married woman is evidence On the collapse of worries and problems. Interpretation of a man’s vision of amuletsIf someone sees in a dream that he is burning amulets, this means that his life will change for the better. If a man sees amulets on his body, this indicates the presence of many enemies in the fortuneteller’s life. Deciphering amulets in a man’s dream indicates To many charitable works.Interpretation of seeing magic amulets in a dream. What I mean is to see hieroglyphics in a dream. A deceitful person approaches an unmarried girl who manipulates her feelings and takes advantage of her feelings by lying to her. Seeing amulets on the walls of the house indicates the sins and sins committed by one of the family members. Visual expression. Amulet design on the wall of the room. A lot of gossip and profanity that Perpetrated by the dreamer. Deciphering spells or erasing them portends the dreamer’s repentance and return to God and abandoning sins. A vision showing a place of magic. Seeing a magic place indicates knowledge of a place of work and magic, and this is manifested by seeing dogs, open space, or snakes. Excessive yawning indicates that the dreamer is engaged in magic. Seeing a place with magic indicates that he A place where forbidden things are done, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing dead people bewitched. Seeing a bewitched person. Meaning of loss of grace due to immorality. Seeing a bewitched person symbolizes overthinking and distraction from life’s problems and loss. Interpretation of magic in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq. MagicIn the dream, the dreamer’s arrogance indicates that he is very proud and will regret and regret what he did. These visions

title: Interpretation of a married woman marrying a man in a dream

preview.html: The dream of a woman marrying someone other than her husband to someone she knows from a familiar or strange man and wearing a white dress. Seeing a wedding is good news and optimism, especially if the dreamer wakes up feeling happiness and joy, then this vision portends the fulfillment of goals, cherished desires and ambitions, success, luck and good luck. The fortuneteller’s vision on That he is wearing a dress like a wedding dress indicates that this woman will enter into a new relationship or a new stage in her life, which may be a love relationship, friendship, a new job, or kinship. As for seeing a married woman as if she got married in a dream, this has one meaning, which is that the wife She will soon obtain goodness, benefit, favor, and livelihood, both for her own person and for the good that accrues to her husband and children. Or the family in general. As for the husband seeing in his dream that his wife is marrying another man, or that his wife is marrying another man, this indicates money, profits, and the abundant profit that this man will obtain in some trade or work. Seeing a pregnant woman as if she had married someone other than her husband without showing it. Any characteristics of marriage, this indicates that she gave birth to a daughter. title: Interpretation of a dream about washing carpets

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing carpets being washed in a dream. Carpets are everything that is placed on the carpet floor and used in homes, offices, hotels, and the like. During the vision site, the interpretation of the vision of washing carpets in a dream in detail, based on the opinion of major commentators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq, or contemporary interpreters, so follow us on the vision. Website. What is the interpretation of washing carpets in a dream according to Imam Ibn Sirin? Seeing folded carpets in a ruler’s dream indicates the death of his rule or his abdication of the throne. Seeing carpets burning indicates material losses, poverty, and anxiety. Seeing furnished carpets indicates a prestigious position. Seeing walking indicates On the carpet indicates liberation from poverty and disease. The vision of buying a carpet indicates material gains. Selling carpets means that you will go on a trip or vacation with friends. Seeing a beautiful carpet for an unmarried young man is a sign of his marriage. What is the interpretation of seeing carpet washing in a dream for a single woman? A vision Washing carpets in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates the loss of anxiety and anxiety and achieving what is desired. If an unmarried girl sees that she is washing carpets, this indicates success and excellence in her life and the fulfillment of her desires. Seeing a clean and beautiful carpet indicates a beautiful life and a bright future. If she sees that Washing a red carpet, this indicates that difficulties and fears will go away. Seeing a girl washing home carpets indicates wealth and fortune. Seeing washing a dirty carpet in a girl’s dream means that she forgot a romantic relationship or engagement that caused her pain and sadness. What is the interpretation of washing carpets in a dream for a married woman Seeing a Persian carpet in a dream for a married woman indicates a decent life and a decent life. Seeing silk carpets indicates luxury and prosperity. A woolen carpet in a dream for a married woman indicates safety and comfort. Seeing washing carpets in a married woman’s dream indicates the disappearance of anxiety and fatigue and the achievement of happiness and stability in life. Her married life. What is the interpretation of a dream about washing carpets for a divorced woman? Seeing her washing dirty carpets in a divorced woman’s dream indicates that God will reward her with kindness and remove worry and sadness. Seeing carpets in a dream for a divorced woman indicates prosperity and well-being and may indicate that she will join a prestigious job with a satisfactory salary. What is the interpretation of a dream about washing carpets with soap and water? Seeing carpets washed with soap and water in a married woman’s dream indicates the death of worry and anxiety and the death of bitterness and strife. Seeing a divorced woman washing carpets with soap and water indicates relief from distress and the removal of sadness and worry. What is the interpretation of seeing carpets in a dream for a single woman? Seeing buying carpets in a dream for a single woman indicates that she has obtained an academic degree such as a master’s or doctorate. Seeing carpets in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates her marriage to a rich and wealthy man. Seeing a red carpet in a dream for an unmarried woman means engagement or marriage. title: Interpretation of the white paper written on it in a dream

preview.html: The written paper for the unmarried, for the married, for the pregnant woman, or the white paper of a man who gave me the writing, the signature, and the letter to Ibn Sirin. A blank piece of paper in a dream generally indicates that you will enter a new phase in life, whether personally or professionally. If you see a blank piece of paper and experience an emotional period, this indicates loyalty Partner, his honesty and sincerity.If you give a white paper to someone, it means that you received money.If you see a well-written white document, it indicates the presence of new and successful projects despite the difficulties.If the handwriting is incomprehensible and bad, it indicates entering into problematic projects despite the sacrifices.If You saw that you are presenting a written piece of paper, it indicates kindness, goal achievement, and alertness. If the written work is anonymous, it means that you will receive harm from someone you did not expect. If you see a piece of paper with good news written on it, it means that you will have many things that will make you You feel grateful and happy. Blue ink indicates stability and passion and you can be happy to see it because its meanings are positive. Red ink indicates doubt and envy, so try to protect yourself from people who are close to you but have bad intentions. If a married woman sees that she is writing in ink on white paper, this means happiness For her children or if the dreamer is an unmarried girl. If she dreams that she is carrying empty papers and pens, this means that she will marry a wealthy stranger who has power and influence. All papers, books and pens in the dream indicate good and happy news. Torn papers, even in a dream, indicate something good Or salvation from a problem that the dreamer has fallen into. If the dreamer sees papers written in black ink in a dream, this indicates that the marriage contract will be completed. If the papers are written in blue, this indicates a certificate of success. If the papers are written in red, this is a sign of a major problem. Papers written in green They are passports. Interpretation of white paper in a dream - YouTube

title: Interpretation of a dream about eating sweets with a pregnant woman’s relatives

preview.html: This can mean many interpretations, which are related depending on the condition of the people who see it, and we will talk about this in detail from gptafser.com/ in the following lines.Interpretation of seeing eating sweets with relatives in a dream for a single girlIf the unmarried girl is dealing with reality, and she sees She is eating sweets in a dream. The vision may indicate that her wedding date is approaching soon, God willing. But if an unmarried girl dreams that she is eating sweets with relatives, the vision shows that there is a lot of affection and understanding between her and her waking relatives. Eating chocolate in a girl’s dream is not For a married woman, it is a sign of the love and happiness that she will enjoy. If an unmarried girl eats kunafa greedily in a dream. The vision indicated that you will suffer from some health diseases that will disappear quickly. This may indicate that some unusual changes will occur in her life. Making sweets in... A dream for an unmarried girl is a sign of a happy occasion that will happen to her with the help of God Almighty. It is said that making sweets is a single girl’s dream. It means success in studies if he continues to study, or success in work if he works or has a project. See also: Interpretation of receiving sweets in A dream for a single woman. Interpretation of seeing eating sweets with relatives in a dream for a married woman. Eating sweets with relatives in a dream for a married woman. It is a sign of the stability and understanding that she feels with the family and relatives. If a married woman sees herself eating sweets with her husband’s relatives in a dream. The vision indicates the existence of friendship. And understanding and tenderness between them and them, even if there are problems of any kind. And he saw this vision, these problems will end by the command of God Almighty. Whereas if a married woman sees in a dream that she is making sweets for relatives. The vision was getting rid of the problems that existed between him and them. Or that he He takes a lot of initiative to solve any problems he faces with them. Perhaps the vision indicates the stability in which the dreamer lives. If a married woman sees herself eating sweets with her husband in a dream. The vision indicates getting rid of marital problems and gaining stability and reassurance. A vision of eating sweets can be seen. Greedily in a married woman’s dream. Because of the many happy circumstances in her life, or that she has a lot of good news. Interpretation of the vision of eating sweets with relatives in a dream about the man and its meaning. Seeing a married man graciously in a dream involves many interpretations. Where the vision of eating sweets with relatives appears In a married man’s dream. However, many happy events will happen to him and his family by the command of God Almighty. But if a married man sees that he is eating sweets with his wife in a dream. The vision indicates happiness, stability, and perhaps getting rid of the problems that existed between the two sides. In the event that he sees A married man himself eats sweets in his workplace in a dream. The vision indicates obtaining a job, a promotion, or something similar. Perhaps it indicates the extension of livelihood and the abundance of money by the command of God Almighty.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing lightning in a dream - Interpretation of seeing thunder in a dream

preview.html: Moments website: Interpretation of dreams of seeing lightning in a dream - Interpretation of seeing thunder in a dream Interpretation of seeing lightning and thunder in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. You can see: Interpretation of a dream of seeing glass Interpretation of seeing lightning and thunder in a dream by Ibn Sirin Thunder: Perhaps it indicates the Sultan’s feast that threatens and frightens him, and it is said From it there is flashing thunder. Perhaps it indicates good promises and generous commands, because the King of the Clouds has commanded to rise and honor those who are sent to him. Thunder also shows the drums of marching and resurrection and the clouds above the soldiers. And lightning on the blades and prisms and colored objects and flags, and rain on spilled blood, and lightning on death. Whoever sees thunder in the sky, this is a common thing for the Sultan. This indicates rain or dates for Sultan Hassan. It has two aspects and it is good for both. And if the dreamer is one of those who are harmed by the rain, such as the traveler, the shorthand, the washerwoman, the bricklayer, the harvester, and whoever follows their path. Then either That the rain will harm him and spoil what he did, and they were given permission to do so before he came. Beware of being prepared and prepared for the rain, whether by order of the Sultan or because of a harmful crime he committed. So what if the rain at that time was as harmful as summer rain? And if he sees thunder and lightning. He confirms the meaning of the promise as it indicates it. And if the sun shines on him and it does not rain, then drums and things come out to him from the Sultan’s conquest and good news comes to him. Or for an emirate that it allocates to some of its rulers, or for a campaign that it takes or that it receives from some of its leaders. However, if Rain, darkness, and lightning strike, either storms from the sky such as hail, wind, locusts, and bears, or pestilence and death. Either rebellion or war, if the state is a warlike state, or people expect it from an enemy. Among them are those who said: Thunder without rain is fear. Despite his imprisonment, release him. Thunder, lightning, and the dawn of rain for the traveler and the greed of the resident. Thunder, the owner of a large police force, Malik, said. Among them are those who said: Thunder without lightning indicates murder, deceit, falsehood, and lies. This is because thunder is expected after lightning. The sound of thunder was indicative of rivalry and conflict. Seeing lightning in an unmarried girl’s dream. Lightning in an unmarried girl’s dream is a good sign, because it heralds good luck or a happy event. Especially if this lightning was followed by rain and that happy event or happy news was on an emotional or practical level. As for the unpleasant sign of seeing lightning in one dream, it is towards an unmarried girl who sees lightning in a dream. A strange color such as red, yellow, or orange, this indicates the phobia and anxiety that this girl is currently suffering from. As for seeing lightning in its natural shape and appearance And in its natural form, there is special news if an unmarried girl feels joy. When she sees it in a dream, and seeing lightning in a dream also portends the return of an absent or long-awaited person dear to her, and God knows best. Seeing lightning in a married woman’s dreamAs for a married woman who sees lightning in Her dream brings good news and blessings that will come to the home or a happy and joyful event that will occur among family members. This happens in the case of seeing lightning in a married woman’s dream.

title: Interpretation of extinguishing a fire in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a fire is one of the things that causes us fear and anxiety, but seeing a fire and the interpretation of extinguishing it in a dream is a different matter, as we said in all previous dream interpretations that seeing something in a dream varies according to the state of insight, in some cases it looks good and in others the opposite, this is the case. It varies according to the social, psychological and health status of the visions, and now through this encyclopedia article we are trying to explain and clarify the different interpretations of seeing fire in a dream. Interpretation of extinguishing a fire in a dream. Interpretation of seeing extinguishing a fire according to Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that seeing a person in a dream extinguishing a fire is a sign of despair and disappointment. Severe. As for his vision of the fire that surrounds him from all sides, this is evidence of the changes that will occur in this person’s life, and these changes in thinking, as well as in his life, personal affairs, and perhaps his currency. Seeing a burning house in a dream also indicates changes in the dreamer’s life. When he sees that he is trying to control the fire and trying to extinguish it, this is an indication of his unwillingness to change. Interpretation of the vision of extinguishing a fire according to Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi believes that when a person sees in a dream that he is trying to extinguish a fire with water, this is evidence that he is exposed to many problems that he cannot solve. In the event that you see That someone is lighting a fire in the oven, then this vision is a sign of kindness and benefit. Seeing fire consuming in a dream is evidence of the money that the visionary is trying to obtain from forbidden money, through injustice and slander. The fire coming out of a person’s hand in a dream is evidence that he is ruling falsely and unjustly. In his ruling. Interpretation of seeing fire for a single, unmarried girl. If she sees a fire coming out of her house in her dream, then this dream indicates that her wedding date is approaching or that some good things will happen. If the fire is very strong, this is evidence that he will get married after going through a long love story. If a girl dreams that fire devours her clothes and burns them, then this dream is evidence that she will achieve all her goals. If a girl sees in a dream that fire is breaking out and she cannot control it, then this Evidence of good changes that will occur in her life very soon and she will reach a high position or perhaps it is evidence of a successful marriage. Interpretation of seeing fire for a married woman. Seeing fire in a dream for a married woman is evidence of an imminent pregnancy. Seeing a strong fire indicates that there are problems between her and her husband. Seeing someone worshiping fire in a dream is evidence that he is far from Almighty God and that he needs to get closer to Him. Interpretation of watching fire for pregnant women If a pregnant woman sees flames in her dream, this is evidence that she will give birth to a girl. If she sees that the flames are very hot and she cannot calm them down, this is evidence She will give birth to a boy. You can interpret more dreams through the direct dream interpretation application.
